long_description: The Benchmade 470-1 Emissary knife offers smooth and fast assisted opening in a thin design that slides easily into a pack or pocket. AXIS(R) spring-assist opening and locking mechanism has been updated to be stronger than its predecessors; provides a safety lock in both opened and closed positions. Ambidextrous thumb-stud design allows you to easily open and close the knife with either hand. Modified drop-point, S30V stainless-steel blade measures 3 in. and has a blade hardness of 58-60HRC; blade is 0.09 in. thick. The Benchmade 470-1 Emissary knife features high-strength aluminum alloy handle scales and a reversible, deep-carry tip-up pocket clip.
short_description: The Benchmade 470-1 Emissary knife offers smooth and fast assisted opening in a thin design that slides easily into a pack or pocket.
